TopicTitle: Coming soon, for the simulator enthusiasts who play KSP, The KMil Kmi-8KTV!

Articles.Content:
The next aircraft in my series!

![AdlvxMl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AdlvxMl.jpg)

Available for free only on the KSP forums!

It will be released on the following hours or days!

**Preorder now by posting in this thread!**

Stats of the craft will be posted soon!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-02T17:24:22Z" title="08/02/2015 05:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 2, 2015</time> by gmpd2000**
I was watching the testing phase of this monster - it will be epic! Nice name btw ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
